Blog.post: early morning go skool late 5 mins nia.. kanna question.. then do pumping...sianz diaoz.. the red cross guy.. seem deaf to mi .... wadeva we sae.. he cannot hear.. muz make us repeat dunno how mani times... then keep scolding us.. then make up run up n down up n down the spiral staircase.. dunno how mani bloody timex. then do pumping dunno how mani times also... machiam physical training liddatz.. realli v lame loh.. i cannot tahan sialz.. can stay at home slp dun wan.. instead go join tis retard course.. everione was like sianz sianz sianz.. all wanna go home.. then nex week dun wan go ... hahaz.. jialat sialz our tis grp.. got quite alot will tok back to him or defy him.. rebellious sialz.. hahaz..funnie..especially joanna n caryn.. pro manz..*pei fu pei fu* also.. he ar.. tok lotta crap.. tinking tt todae is e 1st session n we still haf to attend another 3 more session b4 we can end tis crappie thing.. ai yah.. so happie when todae the thing end.. actualli wann go find ms lee teach mi amaths de.. in the end she sae she going anna chan hse.. then sae tml morning.. ai yah.. nvm also..todae tired enuff liaoz.. after tt went home.. watch the olympics.. lee jia wei vs the korean... score damn close.. in the end spore lose by 2 points..haiz.. sad....realli feel like crying at the time..neway.. my sis n cousin is hosting 2 japanese frm japan whu r frm the red cross unit de.. they staying over 1 nite nia.. now they going sentosa..1 of the girl is 18 yrsold.. another 17yrs old.. both v cheerful..the sight of tis reminds mi when i hosted ono kanako... miss them lotz man!nvm.. aiming to go japan.. muz study hard.. right in front of mi now is emaths book.. wanna start doing but in the end cum write entry..heee...finally todae i got to noe li ying .. nice girl though..=) ben todae cuming my hse..hee.. my mum invited him cum eat dinner wor.. seafooood..... great stuff..lolz..oh yar.. tml [SaRaH] birthdae...!! 22nd August... gonna 15yrs old le wor.. geez... i haven buy her prezzie.. busy this few daes man..also.. ytd read serra, sarah, niko, nie de blog.. all their blog so nice.. mine like sai.. so plain..haha.. lazie to make it nice nice man..niko wrote alot.. ytd i read her blog till 1+am.. kinda lotz of stuff.. but sum i dun get to understand...[17][7]? no idea... neway..happie to noe more abt niko..eh also.. todae during the course , the table infront of mi got alot niko write de.. cox i recognize her signature..wonder wads [17] in her mind.. haha.. neway.. dun care lar.. juz happie to haf her closer to mi again..=)

hmm..todae fridae le..cum skool tot got meeting then in the end dun haf.. make mi cum skool early.. sianz..ok lar.. got to speak to julia n serra.. hope they are okae now? todae they confront each other but in the end both parties end up crying.. but maybe becox they were feeling sad or angry.. at the pe unit there. they had a talk..but in the end, ended up quarreling.. then serra 1st 1 to walk off then went aside to cool down herself..julia continue to tok to sarah.. but i realli tink there are misunderstanding in btw nor..mi, manda n the rest do not side whoeva.. we r juz sum sort of [neutral] party..i wan to stop n speak also cannot.. they continue toking.. awww...i noe they are trying not to speak in a angry tone.. but in the end they canot tahan.. then julia walk awae..haiz maybe she realli v angry.. sarah was upset too... i wanna explain things to julia.. but im afraid to..dunno y.. i realli wan to cool julia down.. but frm how much i noe her fer the past 2+ years.. wad she need is time to cool herself down. both sides were damn piss off.. then in the end when i explain to serra clearly of wad the misunderstanding were, she kept wanting to apologised to sarah.. i noe she wanted. a word sorrie could juz bring back the bond together again.. tt is a great thing u haf done, serra...its brave of u to juz accept wad was wrong or right n also to speak up wadeva u haf in ur mind..neway when i saw serra n sarah in the end hug each other n cried.. i at the side both eyes fill wif tears liaoz.. tt a v touching moment..love it man! heee.... now is julia turn.. whether she accept to forgif n forget is all up to her.. juz wanna sae. julia, relax..wadeva u do we r always behind you.. dun feel alone juz becox we werent there fer u.. but in our heart we cared alot to you.. hope u will noe tt.. we al love u. no one will put u back.. n tt wad frends are fer.. to accompany u when u r lonely..hope u get over tis issue soon..*smiLex*when u are okae...rmb we all loved u as much as b4.. [cased closed] back to skool...todae got emaths mock test n physics test.. tink can pass bahz.. hee.. then after tt got nth to do until 2.30pm got emaths remedial..so mi, vany, rah, carrick n damien go eat lunch.. then suddenly the weather turns dark.. then strong wind pick up.. then can see the whole place out there like snowing.. cox the wind blew then the leave all flying ard... damn nice..like winter sonata..heee..then cuming up is heavy rain... n is realli damn heavy plus strong wind..we sitting at the round table.. then the wind blow , our plates lar, cups.. all starting to blow awae..haha funnie sialz.. all ciaoz ..eunice cum also.. then euncie n sarah act as weather forcast ppl . then act until damn funnie...neway.. after tt when to remedial until 3.30.. then after tt go study area do physics hw.. its actualli a compulsory study programme for the sc..at ard 5.30pm go for salsa.. hee.. another relaxing timex.. laugh n laugh n laugh..after tt no more liao.. go home liao ...[end]

okae...here goes my daily entry...ytd watch the badminton match.. susilo played against the thailand guy... lost 15 - 10 and 15 - 1... i was there half watching, half doing homework.. realise tt susilo ytd dint realli played out his best.. n maybe he was too kan chiong or wad.. juz kinda sad fer him as he actualli could make it de..ai yah.. but still happie he could get singapore till tt far.. then ytd the [dunno whu] won the ping pang match against japan... hee... got hope got hope..=D okae i cut my crap..erm.. todae happen kinda alot of things... early in the morning sarah show mi a entry written by serra..v long.. erm.. while reading..i noe sumting gonna happen soon.. serra actualli wrote out wad she haf been keeping in her mind frm us except julia.alrite..serra if ur reading, this is fer u..[ im not siding neone.. but juz wanna sae.. serra u should make clear of things b4 saeing other ppl.. at 1 point, u said u doesnt like sarah's attitude.. n others.. tink of it in another wae.. its her natural self.. we love her fer her straight forwardness attitude.. u dun expect sumone to change his/her attitude juz becox u dislike it..also.. u haf known her fer 3 years le.. its long enuff not tt u duno her..also we been called as slackerz which shld be united as we are.. but suddenly the gaps that we haf now are not totally our fault as wad u said tt it's becox of us tt make u n julia lonely..this is 1 part im quite angry off.. cox we haf always wanted to be close to u n julia juz like last time.. howeva..look at the time when u both were together..go home together straight after skool.. nv wait fer us de..den in skool walk ard.. u both wont mix wif us wan.. we haf always wanted to tok to u both.. but always nv see u all during the free time..ask u all go out.. u cannot n julia dun wan..oh yar.. the japan issue.. dun tink until so negative mar, im damn sure u can make it wan juz tt u dun dare to tink tt far.. n this doesnt mean tt manda was v sure tt she will go..whu wasnt excited to go japan?when we are toking abt tt subject, it was u n julia whu doesnt want to join us..rmb during the counselling time,u told manda dun be so lack of confident or wad.. then now when manda was able to tink positive n willing to work hard at her studies.. u was saeing her of thinking too far.. ai yah.. juz wanna sae.. it was not wad u was thinking..also another thing.. u scolded eunice 'freaking bitch' fer wad? juz becox she always go wif another grps of frend n sum sort of wad u call flirting? i dun tink tt right lohz.. cox it was her freedom to choose whu she wana mix wif..n sarah scolded u off becox of tt cox she thought u was abit too far.. n u tink tt she always scolding u..i myself tink u have gone too far liaoz.even eunice when she read ur entry, she cried becox of tt, u said u dislike eunice..tt realli hurt her feeling..there's 1 point i support u n that is when sarah kanna scolded by mrs lau, sarah was damn buay song n u was trying to explain to her tt mrs lau is actualli caring fer her. but yet she scolded u rite? i agreed tt she's in the wrong..ai yah.. juz rmb this.. wadva u tink in ur mind may not be always right..u haf to find out wad realli happen b4 trying to sae them..cox this might cause misunderstanding n hatred...ai yah.. i juz hope our slackerz still survive. i dun wan to juz becox of tis n cause the breakdown of our friendship..hope u understand..sorrie if i haf offend u in ani ways. but tis r wad i haf in my mind..] - end - continue my life.. erm..surprisingly todae i got my full attention in evey lesson.. dint even feel tired at all.. during eng lesson mrs lau nv cum then 1 teacher cum relief us.. tt teacher is ms hilda..she v funnie.. hair style v nice..puffy..then her voice hardly neone can hear.. n also i dun realli tink she can teach n handle a class yet.. juz funnie when i tink of her.. then after all the lesson,i ask aufar where is the form he last time borrow frm mi de..he said he left it on the table or in the stacks of books... but i told him i check liao... he sae he rmb he put it there.. then i sae dun haf.. i damn piss man..i realli nv see the form on my table at ne time.. then there goes my form.. haiz.. shouldnt haf borrowed him knowing tt he will nehow put the form de..neway, after tt i go pack my stuff...then i tink sarah threw the softball ball then kanna my head... pain like hell.. hahaz.. 1st normal reaction of cox is cry la.. softball soo hard..then she throw hard also.haha.. but nvm lar.. after a while alrite liaoz..then after tt go meeting..after tt actualli gonna ask ms lee teach mi amaths de.. but in the end i wait until 5.30pm she sae tml then teach cox mani ppl wan her to teach too.. then i boh pian go home.. on the bus saw mr lam.. scare mi sialz..hee.. neway.. i stop here le.. kinda long...[tatx][peace out]

erm.. todae..1st period, physics mr lee nv cum.. free period.. got 2 period pe.. then eng double period free.. but still feel relax todae even though there werent much free period.. during recess got socks check.. but i dint go help check.. cox they dint inform mi..so heck ar.. hee.. heard tt mani ppl kanna sum dint even wear socks.. wah jialat man...guys also check..hahaz.. then when in class, mr lam go ard to every class n check.. scariee sialz.. lucky mine still pass.. then damien n alfy run awae i tink.. hahaz.. so funnie..tt qin heng go pull his pants damn high then toot like hell sialz..in the end irvin n eileen kanna.. need buy socks..sianz diaoz..oh yar.. frm 11am - 1pm, wei chong sae the m1 promotion or wad.. then sae during tt period of time send mms free of charge.. then he send alot to everyone... then send mi quit a few too.. hahaz... todae bag also heavy becox of all the jersey n bball stuff.. then when cum skool, kanna inform no training.. bloody hell... no one tell mi.. then make mi bring sooo mani things... tt jamie on dunno wad dae cum joke joke wif mi sae wed got training. then i tot she sae fer real.. how i noe she juz joking nia... piss off...... but alrite lar... i noe her character liddat wan.. cannot blame... heee...*sorrie hor jamie if i sae nething tt piss u... hmm.. after skool go KAP makan lunch.. then i tot he still in skool.. now then i noe he kanna send home.. hmm.. neway juz wanna sae... realax kaez? dun get so piss off..also.. if the ear hole continue bleeding.. gif it up lahz.. if not u haf to endure the pain all the time.. not worth it okae.. sekali later kanna infection... neway.. juz an opinion lahz.. its ur choice to do wad u want..=)

'want to hear frm the bottom of my heart about ur class?' 'YES!' 'okae...and that is, uR cLass SUX'.. tt was the scentence i heard frm this particular teacher call mr ng i tink?the band teacher wadeva.. cum to our class relief our class.. SHEN JING BING wan... cum in nia then the malays student going fer their mother tongue.confirm noisy de mar.. he juz cum in cannot stand the noise.. then scold us. critisize our class like siaoz.. keep comparing our class wif the last year 3/1. sae our attitude is getting from bad to worse.. then wad lar.. kao pehz.. machiam we got offend him liddat.. cum in tok wad crap..sae we think big lar, act clever... wadeva lar.. almost most of the teachers in our class tink so.. our class can onli endure that in silence..cox whu can we complain to? as if like we want to act smart.. is all the teacher dun like our attitude then prefer 3/2 or this year sec 4.. their expectations frm us is soooo damn bloody high... tok a little kanna scolding.. sae express 1st class shudnt tok at all... then wad lar.. I HATE IT sialz.. wad kind of skool is this man.. tt teacher realli make mi furious sialz.. dun even noe our class well.. then listen frm other teacher gossip or complain lar.. then cum in straight scold us.. wad position he haf to scold ur sialz.. in my mind thinking' would u shut the hell up,ass!'tok non stop man.. BTH...!!also..our result so jialat.. cannot blame us wad... wad kind of combinations subject is this..everything pure pure.. then humanities .. our tis batch humansities damn jialat..yet its a compulsory subject.. ai yah... i dunno wad to sae lar.. juz haf a feeling im going to fail lotsa subject le...todae also kinda peaceful.. cox got sum1 nv come..hahaz..neway, tired also..juz went fer amaths tuition.. then revise on remainder theorems.. haiz.. then found out i forgot how to do again.. die liao lar.. whu can help mi sialz.. im failing in every subject.. i need sumone to teach mi amaths!!! n i also want to drop bio.. cant take it. i wan to drop to 3/2 ... ai yah.. i want i want.. but in the end.. cannot be done.. haiz...

as said by sum 1.. am a da mang ren [ busy person ].. hee.. todae is our skool founders' dae.. haf all the mass, prayers, songs, n others... we were told to stand sit stand sit dunno how mani times..then tt wei chong keep saeing how handsome he is... hahaz.. sit beside him can die manz.. listen to all his crap..but funnie guy though.. laughing thru while sitting beside him..juz a guy younger than mi but bigger size then mi..after all the celebration, we went to class 3/2 as they are holding a farewell party fer mrs lau... todae her last dae in skool le... the nex time we gonna see her is nex year sialz.. wads tis manz..all the gd gd teacher pregnant..dunno wad they doing sialz..our skool teacher all so hyper active de.. not bad ehz..heeee... neway, back to the party..got lotsa food; cakes, jelly, mani mani more... oh well.. after tt.. i got to touch mrs lau tummy... heee... 1st time touch leh.. hard hard de.. nice feeling manz!! hahaz..realli cute loh.. imagine the babie inside... then he kick.. we can feel it wif our hand sialz.. ai yoh.. cannot tahan sialz..cute dao ban si...neway.. after tt.. went fer the forum thingy.. which includes sc + chairperson + vice-chairperson... then mr marcel lee also.. plus the welfare teachers..neway.. basically to voice out ne suggestions to help the skool to be a betta place.. we came out wif a few ideas.. one of it is the socks issue..then the shoelace issue..n mani others..dun be surprised if the skool rule is being change to our favour.. hahaz.. muz thanx to us wor.. but actually all tt hafta go thru teachers then blah blah blah.. so not sure whether will haf ne changes nort.. after tt..got salsa dance.. fun fun fun.. hee..starting to enjoy salsa like hell..heee..fun man.. kanna turn here turn there..basically..todae dint get to get out of skoool n enjoy.. but its okae..=)

heee.. todae wake up at 11.45am..then go eat breakfast [bubble tea]+[pizza] hhaaz..kinda abnormal meal, i noe..=) then meet amanda, yt, damien go melvin house study.. in the end i finish my emaths weekend asg..heez.. but afterall.. we spent most of our time eating, talking, listening to all the wierd wierd song.. learn sum ting todae the A.D.I.D.A.S song.. funnie sialz..and others too..kinda kool..after tt go bukit timah there play pool again..play fer 1hr++ then ciaoz liaoz.. actually i shld buy food outside eat de.. but i lazy so nv eat dinner.. but alrite too, cox i still got abit of french fries..happie though..=)todae total relaxing.. no stressssss.....=D happie!! heee..tml is founders' dae.. after tt we got forumn then after tt got salsa practise again wor..but nvm.. no study is good enuff fer mi... [stRess.ouTta]

wOoOoo... early morning wake up at 7am.. then daddy fetch mi go skool.. then straight go find moses as he pass mi his class jersey..cox i no red shirt mar.. then borrrow frm him lorx. thanx hor KoR..!! hmm.. the cluster humanities challenge tingy vvvvv sianz sialz.. sit there frm 9am till 12.30pm.. sianz like hell..listen n llisten n listen.. but good ting got [qin heng][carrick][gabriel][hian chong][vanessa][conan][wan wen][caryn][hao quan] i went wif all funnie funnie de.. at least got entertaiment..=) after tt, go bukit timah there eat ice cream prata + milo dinosaur.. fullllll... heee.. eat finsih liao we all go chiong play pool..meeting irvin..i go lend aufar my class jersey wif my name behind to him..he look kinda wierd in it..heeee..neway, we play frm 3++ until 7pm..fun man.. also laugh until pengz.. oh yar.. the ting we todae keep doing is changing of shoes.. i like carrick's skater shoe.. nice man.. keep wearing it.. lolz..eh.. not to forget ... wanna sae happie bdae to wan wen.. [HaPpiE.bDaE!!] d=D soo far.. todae nv study at all.hee.. but tml i will be a damn guaiz girl.. having study group wif frends.. also..to dae saw 2 times, once in skool n 2nd when he walking outside.. then he bu fu qi..wahhaa... bleahz!!i got sharp eyes mar..boh pian.. again todae he got match..hope he did not injured himself again.. he kinda clumsy wan loh..frm wad i observe .. hahaz..neway.. i guess i stop here le..[ tatx]

todae onli got amaths, chem, chi, physics lesson... then amaths, chem and physics lesson do test all the way.. then chi lesson do correction for the test papers..get dissapointed when i got back my papers.. get onli 27.5/50... haiz...den anna chan so fast mark finish the papers then return us.. get onli 13/30.. chem n physics i confirm fail wan... haiz.. sooo so far.. all the test i did todae all fail...then 2.30pm got emaths remedial got test again.. i noe how to do it during revision.. dunno why during test my mind completely blank.. haiz.. sickening...oh well.. fail tt test too...no wonder todae call 13th fridae... suay dae.. den after our physics test, is the catholic tingy..then mr lee stay in our class..then start his crap again.. always cum in black face.. as if we see liao v song liddat...then scold us sae we always do ms pang hw lar.. or wadeva..then nv do his hw.. then he tt time when ms pang in our class, we greeted her well.. then when mr lee cum in.. we all tone all low like hell.. then he jealous .. sae wad..wahz greet ms pang so good then greet him like sai liddat.. then always compare our attitude towards ms pang n him... then sae if we dun like him.. tell us go propose to change form teacher.. sae wad ask ms pang cum becum our form teacher then he go 2/8.. ai yar.. i dunno wad to sae sialz... he sibei CHILDISH sialz... liddat also jealous.. at least he shld haf a betta attitude towards ur b4 we show back him a good attitude.. how he want us to do all this when he himself dun even show a good example.. sumtime in class scold us stupid lar.. fool lar.. or wadeva.. kaoz... irritating leh.. then todae when scolding us, put both his leg on the table.. machiam like he boss or wad..dun tell mi he is teaching us to sit liddat also..ai yah.. 3/1 is not realli a good class fer mi to enter.. i've made the wrong choice.. lucky todae got salsa.. help mi destress.. realli sialz.. all the wae laughing.. bth.. the onli time which i could relax myself manz..haiz.. [ - gonez - ]

haiz..dunno why nowadaes soo suay. todae ms soo nv cum, so no chem test.. idiot make mi study all the way till 1.30am..todae juz got rid of history n emaths test.. tml still got another 2 test.. actually onli got amaths test de.. then during the flight simulation course, ah meng cum in.. scolding us off as usual... fer wad the skool sae our skool com kanna virus.. then they suspect our class as sum of our classmates go surf net during the course...as fer punishment, ah meng juz straight sae tml gif test.. kaoz.. sibei last min loh..after the course mi, vany n cinda go find mr lee tell him to postpone it or wad.. he gif stupid attitude sae wad blame ur class fer all the trouble cause for him.. then tok lotta crap.. in the end i juz walk awae.. too pek cek to see his childish face.. even my frend mum also sae the first time see him, sae he got childish face..attituide also..! bth ar.. freaking heeeLLLLLL... hafta study till late nite again.. wad sialz.. pressurizing sialz..hate to enter 3/1.. stresssss... cannot tahan nemore.. gonna breakdown netime.. the teacher keep giving soo damn lot hw.. how the hell they want us to revise...irritating..sec 3 life sux big time![stResS]

early in the morning.. late fer exco meeting.. but nvm, cox all exco also late..then during pe lesson..mr tok find mi then told mi he saw mi jaywalking in the morning when he was driving to skool.. but gif warning nia..since the 1st lesson had started, i started to haf running nose.. not normal wor... is continuously.. irritating.. then use dunno how mani packets of tissue.. todae also got eng test..half writing.. half sneezing.. then after the test.. mrs lau repeat dunno how mani times to hand in the papers... i tot i did.. so dint bother.. how i noe till the nex lesson..then i realize my papers being covered by my maths worksheet...idiot.. in the end go find mrs lau. kanna scolding frm her. haiz...also forgot to do emaths asg which is due todae... sianz..oh yar.. todae recieved back my amaths test paper.. heee...got 1/25 wor.. pro manz..then after all tis.. bball training.. went training despite my flu..also recess time eat laksa.. then training time.. chest damn hot.. difficult to train sialz.. realli hate tis kind of daes...now hafta chiong study chemistry n history for tml test.... ai yah.. wad a retardz dae man...! =(

hai yoh.. soooo fast.. 5 daes holidae gonna over le..why sialz.. i haven even started studying.. confirm die man.neway, todae morning wake up ard 12noon..then eat lunch.actually wanna go out buy shoe de..then in the end wait fer ben to cum my hse 1st...ard 3.45 left house.. ben sae wan pass sumting to his frend, inthe end play badminton fer abt 20 mins.. left yt waiting alone at lot 1..poor thing sehz.reach far east ard 5++pm - 6pm le.. went walk walk ard far east.. couldnt find a suitable type...tt moses soo zhun, predict i confirm cannot make up my mind de.. so, in the end nv buy neting go home..funnie thing is my mom invite ben cum my hse eat dinner, he sae he pai seh sialz... dint noe he will pai seh de...but still he finish all up..hahaz..neway.. thanx bEn fer helping mi get my com fixed!!=D [taTx]

national dae.. yet dint go out.. hahaz. instead stay at home do housework..scrub the floor n wipe the window + grill...wads this man..but still going out later.. also ytd went out wif niko, sam, hao, moses, ivan, zhong wei, vanessa go watch movie [ I robot ] some sae dun understand.. sum sae intresting but dun understand the whole story..i myself also dunno whether i noe the story not..neway.. after tt went esplanade..but missed the damn firework.. sianz diaoz...actually at nite sit down the merlion there... chit chat also not bad... juz wanna thanx my bro mao mao! fer accompanying mi ytd..=) also ivan tt chatter box.. foreva toking non stop.. zhongwei tt blur kia, funnie guy ar he.. hope they enjoyed themselves ytd...[-g0nex-]
